import React from 'react' import "./category_products.css" import { Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom" const CategoryProducts = ({id, title, features, specs,price}) => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const featureList = ()=>{ let FL = [] for(let i = 0; i{features[i]}) } return FL } return ( <>

{title}

Dimensions

{specs.dimensions}

Features

    {featureList()}

£{price}

) } export default CategoryProducts
